title: ChangeEvent
description: This schema defines webhook for receiving events from OpenMetadata

id.description: Unique ID associated with a webhook subscription.

name.description: Unique name of the application receiving webhook events.

endPoint.description: Endpoint to receive the webhook events over POST requests.

eventFilters.description: Endpoint to receive the webhook events over POST requests.

batchSize.description: Maximum number of events sent in a batch (Default 10).

enabled.description: When set to `true`, the webhook event notification is enabled. Set it to `false` to disable the subscription. (Default `true`)

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity.

status.description: Status is `notStarted`, when webhook was created with `enabled` set to false and it never started publishing events. Status is `success` on 200 response to notifications. Status is `error` on bad callback URL, connection failures, and `1xx`, `3xx` response. Status is `awaitingRetry` when previous attempt at delivery timed out or received `4xx`, `5xx` response. Status is `retryLimitReached` after all retries fail.

failureDetails.description: Failure details are set only when `status` is not `success`

lastSuccessfulAt.description: Last non-successful callback time in UNIX UTC epoch time in milliseconds

lastFailedAt.description: Last non-successful callback time in UNIX UTC epoch time in milliseconds

lastFailedStatusCode.description: Last non-successful activity response code received during callback

lastFailedReason.description: Last non-successful activity response reason received during callback

nextAttempt.description: Next retry will be done at this time. Only valid is `status` is `awaitingRetry`.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.
